title: VS (canteen) - Quick Facts
text:
Category | Food and Beverages
Location | VS Hall
Cuisines | Indian, fast food
Timings | 8PM to 2AM
Seating capacity | 80
Employees | 15
References: [ 1 ]

title: VS (canteen)
text: VS canteen , often shortened to VS , is the night canteen of VS Hall , and one of the most popular night canteens on campus. It is one of the few night canteens where both men and women are allowed, the other three being Eggies , JCB and HJB.
